channel.title: Rune-Alive 317 [Closed Beta]
channel.description:
Hello, firstly I would like to thank you for viewing my thread. This new server I'm starting has no name currently as I can't think of a good name for it sadly. My overall goal for this server is, while maintaining a well-respected server, have a good PvP base, and a great economy. I'm debating on weather or not I'll release to the forums to help out, either way you'll get to play it.
Client: My client is based off a 317 deob, with added 474 Animation, 474 NPC's, and 474 Objects, the only thing I don't have is 474 Maps, sadly :(.
Server: A cleaned version of DeltaScape was my choice, as it has none of the old minigames he created on it, I will re-write them only using the old ones as a base.
Media:
[b]Correct Animations: Such as Barrelchest Anchor[/b] [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/3129/anchor.jpg[/img]
[b]Working Bolt Effects[/b] [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6277/boltsy.jpg[/img] [img]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/3677/bolts2j.jpg[/img]
[b]Base of Clue Scrolls[/b] [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/1194/clues.jpg[/img]
[b]Working on DBow have this so far[/b] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/2604/darkbowr.jpg[/img]
[b]Bolt Enchanting[/b] [img]http://img816.imageshack.us/img816/7262/enchantinga.jpg[/img]
[b]All SkillCapes, but only showing 2 :)[/b] [img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/9004/skillcapes.jpg[/img] [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/6145/skillcapes2.jpg[/img]
[b]TeleTabs(:[/b] [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/1617/tabsr.jpg[/img]
I WILL update this topic daily, please post support, and if you don't support don't post :).
[b][i][u]Update 1: New Clue Scroll[/u][/i][/b] A new clue scroll was added, it requires you to bow to the statue of a king at the Camelot Castle, then when you bow, a NPC spawns and you must kill it, upon death you are given your reward. :D.
[img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/3487/newclue.jpg[/img] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4774/newclue1.jpg[/img] [img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/9918/newclue2.jpg[/img]
[b][i][u]Update 2: Full Herb Cleaning, GS Making, and DFS Making:[/u][/i][/b]
[img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/6181/herbst.jpg[/img]
Video Herblore - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWonpeww8Wg]YouTube - Null[/url] Video GS Making, and DFS Making - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sLlvEvDM7Ps]YouTube - Null[/url] SkillCapes - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JA4zCmBNTIg]YouTube - Null[/url]
[b][i][u]Update 3: 100% Full Herblore:[/u][/i][/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RiozhYo1N7U]YouTube - Null[/url]
I am having a closed beta please, post if you want accepted there are very few spots!

item.title: Rune-Alive 317 [Closed Beta]
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

Hello, firstly I would like to thank you for viewing my thread. This new server I’m starting has no name currently as I can’t think of a good name for it sadly. My overall goal for this server is, while maintaining a well-respected server, have a good PvP base, and a great economy. I’m debating on weather or not I’ll release to the forums to help out, either way you’ll get to play it.

Client: My client is based off a 317 deob, with added 474 Animation, 474 NPC’s, and 474 Objects, the only thing I don’t have is 474 Maps, sadly :(.

Server: A cleaned version of DeltaScape was my choice, as it has none of the old minigames he created on it, I will re-write them only using the old ones as a base.

Media:

Correct Animations: Such as Barrelchest Anchor

Working Bolt Effects

Base of Clue Scrolls

Working on DBow have this so far

Bolt Enchanting

All SkillCapes, but only showing 2

I WILL update this topic daily, please post support, and if you don’t support don’t post :).

Update 1: New Clue Scroll
A new clue scroll was added, it requires you to bow to the statue of a king at the Camelot Castle, then when you bow, a NPC spawns and you must kill it, upon death you are given your reward. :D.
